duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively identify and recommend financial products and services to help members reach their goals.
Service members on the teller line with monetary transactions, account maintenance, and other financial services.
Maintain and deepen member relationships through consultative analysis and recommendation of financial products.
Build and optimize the referral network and pipeline to meet or exceed monthly performance metrics.
